lines.gurmukhi: jau pY qUMbrI n bUfy srq prvwh ibKY ibKmY qaU n qjq hY mn qy
lines.transliteration_english: Jau Pai Toonbaree N Booday Sarat Paravaah Bikhai , Bikhamai Taoo N Tajat Hai Man Tay ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If a colocynth (Tumna) does not sink in fast flowing river and it does not shed its bitterness even in sweet cold water, then what good it is?

lines.gurmukhi: jau pY lptY pwKwn pwvk jrY sUqR jl mY lY boirq irdY kTorpn qy
lines.transliteration_english: Jau Pai Lapatai Paakhaan Paavak Jarai Sootra , Jal Mai Lai Borit Ridai Katthorapan Tay ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If the flame of fire cannot burn the stone, and if due to its rigid nature sinks everything along with it, then what good it is ?

lines.gurmukhi: jau pY gufI aufI dyKIAq hY AwkwscwrI brsq myNh bwcIAY n bwlkn qy
lines.transliteration_english: Jau Pai Gudee Udee Daykheeat Hai Aakaasachaaree , Barasat Maynh Baacheeai N Baalakan Tay ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A kite is seen flying in the sky like a bird, but when it starts raining it cannot be saved and retrieved by the children flying it.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy iriD isiD Bwau duqIAw qiRgun Kyl gurmuK suKPl nwih kiRqGin qy ]478]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Ridhi Sidhi Bhaau Douteeaa Trigoun Khayla , Gurmoukh Soukhaphal Naahi Kritaghani Tay ?478?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, acquiring miraculous powers like walking on the water, immunity of burning or floating in the sky is indulging in duality and is the influence of the three trait mammon (maya). (Acquiring these cannot free one from internal bitterness, nor can
